post:
BuildMyBlock is a semi established gameserver and vps hosting company . All our servers are located in france and run the latest technology.



Why BuildMyBlock?
Just because we said we are quality providers does not convince to buy from us, right?
Chill, we have loads of good things to list about the way we conduct our business which will make you want to buy from us.



Some Advantages:
• 2 Months free when ordering annual packages
• Customer Centric Approach – All packages are built keeping in mind your needs, not our needs.
• Friendly Customer Support – We believe customers are our friends and treat them as one. Our staffs never ever treat our customers rudely. Politeness is warranted.
• Expert Techs – We hire only the best techies to ensure peace of mind for our friends (aka customers).
• Support is available 24 / 7 via ticketing system.
• Live Chat Support Available.
• 99.9 % uptime guarantee SLA.
• Solusvm Control Panel.
• DDoS Protection for those bad days.
• Secure payments via PayPal.
• 7 Day Money Back Guarantee.
• Billing Available in GBP, EUR or USD.
• Intel xeon e5 processors.



Promotions:
• 25% Recurring discount on all services promocode : bmb25 (Excluding any special plans)
• Specials
